retrieval.indexer

Class RetrievalIndexer

  • java.lang.Object
    • retrieval.indexer.RetrievalIndexer
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    RetrievalIndexerDistantStorage, RetrievalIndexerLocalStorage

    public abstract class RetrievalIndexer
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract class for a retrieval indexer. A retrieval indexer can index, delete, get data on a RetrievalServer. The retrieval server may be local (use retrievalServer.getMainStorage()) or distant (host and port)

      • index

        public java.lang.Long index(java.io.File file)
                     throws java.io.IOException,
                            NoValidPictureException,
                            NotValidMessageXMLException,
                            CBIRException
        This function insert a picture on a CBIR storage
        Parameters:
        file - Local file to index
        Returns:
        Image id
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Cannot make a correct connection with server
        NoValidPictureException - Image cannot be read
        NotValidMessageXMLException - Bad message format
        CBIRException - Error from server

      • delete

        public abstract java.util.Map<java.lang.Long,CBIRException> delete(java.util.List<java.lang.Long> ids)
                                                            throws java.io.IOException,
                                                                   NotValidMessageXMLException,
                                                                   CBIRException
        This function delete a list of images on a storage. Images are just removed from results, but they are still in index. You need to run purge (VERY HEAVY OP!) when server will not be used (during night,...) to clean all index data.
        Parameters:
        ids - List of image id to delete
        Returns:
        Map with all deleted files
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Cannot make a correct connection with server
        NotValidMessageXMLException - Bad message format
        CBIRException - Error from server

      • delete

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.Long,CBIRException> delete(java.lang.Long id)
                                                   throws java.io.IOException,
                                                          NotValidMessageXMLException,
                                                          CBIRException
        This function delete a single image on a storage. Image are just removed from results, but they are still in index. You need to run purge (VERY HEAVY OP!) when server will not be used (during night,...) to clean all index data.
        Parameters:
        id - Image id
        Returns:
        Map with all deleted files
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Cannot make a correct connection with server
        NotValidMessageXMLException - Bad message format
        CBIRException - Error from server

      • checkPictures

        public abstract java.util.Map<java.lang.Long,CBIRException> checkPictures(java.util.Map<java.lang.Long,CBIRException> ids)
                                                                   throws java.io.IOException,
                                                                          NotValidMessageXMLException,
                                                                          CBIRException
        This function ask to a server information about indexed pictures on the storage
        Parameters:
        ids - List of image id to delete
        Returns:
        A map with picture list and their exception (NoException if picture is well indexed)
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Cannot make a correct connection with server
        NotValidMessageXMLException - Bad message format
        CBIRException - Error from server

      • listPictures

        public abstract java.util.Map<java.lang.Long,java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String>> listPictures()
                                                                                                     throws java.io.IOException,
                                                                                                            NotValidMessageXMLException,
                                                                                                            CBIRException
        This function get all indexed pictures info from a a storage
        Returns:
        Map of indexed pictures (path and value are metadata)
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Cannot make a correct connection with server
        NotValidMessageXMLException - Bad message format
        CBIRException - Error from server

      • listStorages

        public abstract java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Long> listStorages()
                                                                     throws java.io.IOException,
                                                                            NotValidMessageXMLException,
                                                                            CBIRException
        This function get all storages from a server Only available for distant server.
        Returns:
        Map with each storage and its size
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Cannot make a correct connection with server
        NotValidMessageXMLException - Bad message format
        CBIRException - Error from server

      • purge

        public abstract void purge()
                    throws java.lang.Exception
        Clean index from server with deleted pictures data
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Error during purge
